title: Acupuncture
description: Acupuncture is another form of alternative medicine that is over 5,000 years old! The practice of needle insertion is known to help balance "chi" or "QI." QI is the natural blood flow (energy) that our bodies need to help maintain health and wellness. If you are interested in learning how acupuncture can help you, call and schedule a consultation today!
sitename: Back In Line Family Chiropractic & Wellness
cleaned_text: Acupuncture Back In Line Family Chiropractic and Wellness is happy to offer Acupuncture to our menu of services. Acupuncture is another form of alternative medicine that is over 5,000 years old! The practice of needle insertion is known to help balance "chi" or "QI." QI is the natural blood flow (energy) that our bodies need to help maintain health and wellness. A disruption in blood flow (or unbalanced QI blood) can create issues from aches & pains, increased stress, ADD, intestinal dysfunction (IBS, constipation, diarrhea, gas) ulcers, weight gain, swelling, infertility, failure to sustain pregnancy, sleep disturbances, and allergies.
